title: OnePlus Nord 2 receives fresh OxygenOS update to fix image sharing issue
content:
OnePlus recently rolled out a minor update for the OnePlus Nord 2 featuring the Android security patches for February 2022. Although the update didn’t bring much else in terms of new features or changes, it introduced an annoying bug that freezes the device when sharing images in the Gallery app. OnePlus officially acknowledged the issue

The post OnePlus Nord 2 receives fresh OxygenOS update to fix image sharing issue appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus has started rolling out a fresh OxygenOS update for the OnePlus Nord 2 which fixes the image sharing bug that popped up following the previous update.
